<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 8"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Potion of Quickness](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2950)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=644" />
<trait label="Potion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=672" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 260 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Drinking this silver potion grants you the effects of [_haste_](/Spells.aspx?ID=147) for 1 minute.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
